trans-unit.source: Contains a set of static properties that returns strings that represent security token types.
trans-unit.target: 包含一组静态属性返回表示安全令牌类型的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use SecurityTokenTypes to specify the security token type that must be included in a SOAP message sent by a client or required by a service.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SecurityTokenTypes 指定必须包含在 SOAP 消息的安全令牌类型由客户端发送或服务所需的。

trans-unit.source: To specify the security token type requirement, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.TokenType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定安全令牌类型需求，设置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.TokenType%2A>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.TokenType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents a security token based upon a Kerberos ticket.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示基于 Kerberos 票证的安全令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The two types of security tokens that are based on a Kerberos ticket are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: 基于 Kerberos 票证的安全令牌的两种类型是<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a security token based upon a Kerberos ticket.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于 Kerberos 票证的安全令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents a security token based upon an RSA key.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示基于 RSA 密钥的安全令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken> security token is based upon an RSA key.
A string that represents a security token based upon an RSA key.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于 RSA 密钥的安全令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents a security token based upon a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示基于 SAML 断言的安全令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token is based upon a SAML assertion.
A string that represents a security token based upon a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于 SAML 断言的安全令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents a security token based upon a user name and password.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示基于用户名和密码的安全令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token is based upon a user name and password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>安全令牌基于用户名和密码。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a security token based upon a user name and password.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于用户名和密码的安全令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents a security token based upon an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示基于 X.509 证书的安全令牌的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token is based upon an X.509 certificate.
A string that represents a security token based upon an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于 X.509 证书的安全令牌的字符串。
